description: woman with baby seated on ground, LLQ; figure hanging laundry on clothesline at left center; thatch-roofed cottages and foliage at center and right; cross on church spire, URC
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Edition and Inscription

LLC, in black ink: [a Sagot.]; see Marks
provenance: [Thomas French Fine Art, Fairlawn, Ohio, until 2005; sold in April for TOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2005-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in the print: [A. Lepere]; LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère]
title: La Croix du Bois macon, Bel Automne (Vendée)
